page.title: 13SHOPPING IN WIDNES
page.content: The{Widnes Market}is over 100 years old.{St.John's Market}is the original market but now there are four markets and Saturday is the busiest day.There are two types of market,{Statutory}and {A Gift from the King.Widnes}is {Statutory}and{Frodsham}is{A Gift from {the king.}The nearest market to a statutory one must be at least 6 miles away.Rents are paid daily and the Saturday rental is the highest.People begin by renting a stall if a regular does not turn up.Eventually they would be given a permanent stall. The{Hypermarket}was built in{1975.}It is open 59 hours a week and it has up to 200 full and part time staff.The main competitors of the Hypermarket are the{Asda,Kwik Save}and{Victor {Value.}The last{Cinema}in the town called{The Empire}was closed in 1983 and is to be made into more shops.
